about_the_game:
You are a rat

Smell trash, play with flies and eat cheese. Roleplay as the infamous generic rat and take on a huge journey through your home sewers with substantially wacky encounters, weird puzzles and extremely subtle, often unfunny jokes.

Solve puzzles

You have only one type of move - rotating the 6 hexes around the tile you click on. Use it to overcome a variety of challenges, avoid traps and slay your enemies. The game features quite a big set of mechanics:

  • deadly enemies

  • different weapons and items to use

  • mechanical contraptions

  • pipes that you can squeeze through

  • money and shops

  • ... and many, many more

Genre-bending

Inconceivable Rat Endeavour is mainly a puzzle game. However, it borrows handsomely from other genres and sprinkles it on top of the core mechanics, achieving unique, unconventional and silly gameplay. Match-3, rhythm games, farming sim, or even a full-blown text adventure..? The game takes you on an endeavour, where you'll constantly see new things and travel forward.

Travel the sewers

Visit 3 sewer-stylized, pixelart-esque biomes as you progress. Complete plethora of hand-crafted levels arranged into a linear campaign - a continuous adventure. Dive deeper into new mechanics with level branches that present harder challenges puzzle-wise.

Find legendary infinite cheese

Eat cheese, smell cheese, gamble cheese, harvest cheese, sell and buy cheese... Do what it takes to finish your quest and find infinite cheese that the legends foretold (just a regular cheese, but very big)

...well, you're a rat, what more would you ask for?

Game Features

  • at least one rat

  • exactly 23 types of cheese

  • it's literally a game about a rat

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with Vulkan 1.0
  • Storage: 196 MB available space

name: Inconceivable Rat Endeavour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with Vulkan 1.0
  • Storage: 196 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Wacky rat's endeavour in an unconventional genre-bending hexagonal puzzler. Rotate hexes to make your way out of miserable sewers, collect inconceivable amounts of cheese, avoid deadly traps and prepare for silly surprises.
